bibl.title: P. Ryl. III, 471: A Baptismal Anointing Formula Used as an Amulet. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Identifies the inscription on P. Ryl. III, 471 (= van Haelst 974) as a pre-immersion formula of anointing that was introduced into Eastern baptismal liturgies in the late fourth century.
